Articles.Content:
Look, buddy. Sucking up to Squad won't get you any rewards. Squad don't give out free hand-outs. You will not be "in HarvesteR's good-books" or anything like that. They don't operate that way.

Squad is a business. Their motivation: money. Their inspiration: their bank accounts. They can handle constructive criticism.

So, some friendly advice: Don't try to defend Squad, because they don't care about brown-noses.

Edit: Inb4 I get banned for breaking some non-existent forum rule, and inb4 Nova makes some snide comment. That's just about all he does to anyone who is not brown-nosing him.

Leave the squad alone. these are people who really love what they do, and will try to make as best a version s they can. i'd bet they are working on it right now, but aren't nearly done yet.

Plus they have to deal with jerks like you. Just because Squad is a company doesn't meant evil people run it. They care.

A revamp in the VAB interface is desperately needed IMHO. It is quite cumbersome to walk between pages. And of course the ability of saving parts of ships (launchers, satelites, etc), as already said.
Alright, this went off topic and went south. Locked.
